instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the prediction accuracy of blood urea and glucose, and how far can this metric go in the related study on the prediction of blood urea and glucose?
Output:
The metric chosen to evaluate the prediction accuracy of blood urea and glucose in the related study is the Root Mean Square Error (RMSE). The RMSE values obtained for blood urea and glucose are 0.88 mg/dL and 12.01 mg/dL, respectively.
